channel.title: 'Else' Without 'If'

item.title: 'Else' Without 'If'
item.dc:creator: @WowILikeToCode WowILikeToCode
item.description:
@WowILikeToCode wrote:

hi guys, I’m making a command for my server that allows users to select there loyalty titles, This is what i’ve done and its starting to bug me now this error.

Also does anybody know how i can disable people from setting there rank to 1, 2, 7, 11, 24, 25 and stopping it from going over 33.

This is my command

[code=java]
if (playerCommand.startsWith(“giverank”) && c.changeRank == 1) {
try {
String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
int rank = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
c.loyaltyRank = rank;
c.logout();

 } catch(Exception e) {
	c.sendMessage("Rank must not exceed 33");
 } else if(c.changeRank == 0) {
	c.sendMessage("You are not allowed to change your loyalty title");
 }

}[/code]

This is my compiler error

src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:129: 'else' without 'if' } else if(c.changeRank == 0) { ^ 1 error Press any key to continue . . .

Any help will be appreciated, Thanks in advance

Read full topic
